data.name: ENDURE
data.detailed_description:
"I'm just like you, trapped"

Endure is psychological horror experience exploring the human mind and the effects psychedelics can have on a damaged one. You play as an addict who recently tried a new experimental drug to bury the pain of losing his wife. However, when the 'trip' goes wrong you are plunged into a world where reality and hallucinations are twisted together into an indistinguishable nightmare.

With the help of 'M' navigate the maze try to battle the demons that lurk both within you and the shadows, but be wary of 'M', can she be trusted? Where did she come from? Why does she know so much about the maze? and how has she avoided the creature in the shadows for so long?

data.short_description: Endure is psychological horror experience exploring the human mind and the effects psychedelics can have on a damaged one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel®️ Core™️ i5-4690S
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 M290X
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: 'ENDURE' contains scenes of violence and gore.
